examples: There's nothing in the drawer - I took everything out.

definitions.definition: to be a matter or subject that someone has no good reason to know about or be involved with:
examples: I wish he wouldn't offer advice on my marriage - it's nothing to do with him.

definitions.definition: to have no connection or influence with someone or something:
examples: We are nothing to do with the firm that has the offices next door.

definitions.definition: to have no importance or value:

examples: I got this painting for nothing from a friend.

definitions.definition: with no good result or for no purpose:
examples: He queued for two hours and (all) for nothing - there were no seats left.

definitions.definition: no arrangements for a stated period:
examples: I checked my calendar and I have nothing on on Tuesday afternoon.
mainly UK He had two letters of refusal but, nothing daunted (= not discouraged), he tried again.

definitions.definition: someone of no value or importance:
examples: He's a nothing, a low-down, useless nobody.
